text: Bek hai tause ureueng meuduʻa Seunantiasa geumeuhoi Allah Geumeuhoi Tuhan geuh beungoh seupot Sabab that meuhʻeut keu wajah Allah Hana meularat u ateuh gata Bandum keunira gopnyan kon salah Buet gata pih han meularat gopnyan Tause gopnyan raya that salah Meunyo tause lalem that gata Allah Taʻala meunan Neupeugah
